channel.title: Posts on Sam's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sam's Journey

item.title: Quadrant
item.description: Introduction Quadrant is the first game development project during my time at the University of Hull. Quadrant is a 4 player competitive board game, where each player takes it in turn to fill their Quadrant of the game board, what is represented by their colour. The aim is to be the first player to reach the score limit. Development I was assigned as the programmer of the group alongside one other student.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my first post. Stick around a bit, there’s lots more to come.
